TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridTextBoxColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle

summary.span: Hosts a control in a cell of a for editing strings.

span.span: Hosts a control in a cell of a for editing strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自`abstract`類別。The class derives from the `abstract` class . 在執行階段，主機允許使用者編輯文字的控制項。At run time, the hosts a control that allows users to edit text. 特殊屬性加入至類別包括，和。Special properties added to the class include , and . 這些內容可讓您存取託管控制項和屬性以及集合的格式顯示值。These properties allow you to access the hosted control and its attributes, and set the format for displaying values. 如果資料來源是包含物件屬性應該設定為以邏輯方式可編輯文字方塊控制項中的資料類型。If the data source is a containing objects, the property of the should be set to a data type that can logically be edited in a text box control. 下列資料類型會自動關聯: ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following data types are automatically associated with a : , , , , , , , , , , , and . > [!NOTE] > Visual basic 不完全支援下列類型： ， ， ， ，和。The following types are not fully supported by Visual Basic: , , , , and . （不允許運算子。）(Operators are not allowed.) ## Examples 下列範例會建立並將它加入的。The following example creates a and adds it to the of a . 若要執行這個程式碼範例，將它貼到表單具有名為`dataGrid1`並呼叫它的建構函式從。To run this code example, paste it into a form that has a named `dataGrid1` and call it from the constructor of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會檢查以確定確實發生的編輯。The method checks to ensure that an edit is indeed occurring. 如果是的話，它會適當格式化值。If so, it formats the value appropriately. 如果值為`null`，方法會進入插入資料行; 否則它會使用方法來認可值。If the value is `null`, the method enters into the column; otherwise, it uses the method to commit the value. 方法會呼叫當編輯作業就會認可。The method is called by the when an editing operation is committed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網站上正在編輯的儲存格的位置上的方格控制項。The sites a control on the grid at the location of the cell being edited. 方法會呼叫類別的時編輯的作業即將開始的方法。The method is called by the class's method when an editing operation is about to begin. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以變更中按下儲存格文字控制項。The following example uses the method to change the text of a clicked cell in the control. MemberSignature.Value: public string Format { get; set; }
.property instance string Format
Public Property Format As String
public: property System::String ^ Format { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the character(s) that specify how text is formatted.

span.span: Gets or sets the character(s) that specify how text is formatted.

value.span: 字元的指定方式格式化文字的字元。

span.span: The character or characters that specify how text is formatted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定資料行中值的顯示方式。The property specifies how values are displayed in the column. 例如，將屬性設定為"c"來指定這些值將會格式化為本地貨幣。For example, set the property to "c" to specify that the values will be formatted as the local currency. 的電腦用來判斷實際的貨幣格式。The for the computer is used to determine the actual currency format. 當資料變更時，所自動未格式化為原生類型的值。The values are automatically unformatted to the native type when data is changed. 如需有關格式化字元，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)和[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 您所套用的格式應該是適用於資料類型。The format you apply should be appropriate to the data type. 比方說，如果資料是數值在本質上可使用其中一個數值格式字串。For example, if the data is numeric in nature use one of the numeric format strings. 您可以變更如藉由設定屬性至新執行個體所建構的適當文化特性識別碼。You can change the for a by setting the property to a new instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID. 若要設定應用程式，設定屬性物件至新適當文化特性識別碼。 所建構的執行個體To set the for the application, set the property of the object to a new instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新物件，並將其指派給屬性物件。The following example creates a new object and assigns it to the property of a object. 此範例也設定"c"會指定資料行應該顯示為貨幣值的屬性。The example also sets the property to "c" to specify that the column should display values as currency. [!code-cpp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CPP/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CS/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/VB/datagridtextboxcolumn format.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the culture specific information used to determine how values are formatted.

span.span: Gets or sets the culture specific information used to determine how values are formatted.

value.span: 物件，用於實作介面，例如類別。

span.span: An object that implements the interface, such as the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定時屬性設為其中的格式字元，會使用所提供的資訊屬性，以進一步指定要使用何種文化特性特定格式。When setting the property to one of the formatting characters, the uses the information provided by the property to further specify what cultural-specific formatting to use. 例如，當屬性設為格式字元"c"（適用於貨幣），您可以進一步指定要使用 以的符號。For example, when the property is set to the format character "c" (for currency), you can further specify that the symbol for the lira be used. 若要這樣做，請建立新義大利的地區設定識別碼的物件，並設定屬性至新物件。To do this, create a new object with the locale ID for Italy, and set the property to the new object. 如需有關格式化字元，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)和[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立新物件，並將其指派給屬性物件。The following example creates a new object and assigns it to the property of a object. 此範例也設定"c"會指定資料行應該顯示為貨幣值的屬性。The example also sets the property to "c" to specify that the column should display values as currency. [!code-cpp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CPP/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/CS/datagridtextboxcolumn format.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridTextBoxColumn Format#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridTextBoxColumn Format/VB/datagridtextboxcolumn format.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最佳寬度和高度計算方式是測量字串大小，考量其字型和屬性，然後加上邊界值。The optimum width and height is calculated by measuring the string size, taking into account its font and attributes, and adding margin values. ## Examples 下列範例會使用傳回。The following example uses to return a .
